title: [Discussion] This is frustrating
content: Was working on an app ( building it alone) . Coded for 5-6 hrs today . I had made many random @$$ files so I was deleting them one by one accidentally deleted some important files .I didn't notice it .Now i can't restore the file and chatgpt is not able to generate that code it's giving something else. How to make your mind calm and start with fresh mind again

comments.body: This is exactly why we use git. Always use version control from next time.
